solution_line_template: The number of pink highlighters is {yellow_highlighters} + {pink_more_than_yellow} = <<{yellow_highlighters}+{pink_more_than_yellow}={pink_highlighters}>>{pink_highlighters}
The number of blue highlighters is {pink_highlighters} + {blue_more_than_pink} = <<{pink_highlighters}+{blue_more_than_pink}={blue_highlighters}>>{blue_highlighters}.

The total number of yellow, pink, and blue highlighters is {yellow_highlighters} + {pink_highlighters} + {blue_highlighters} = <<{yellow_highlighters}+{pink_highlighters}+{blue_highlighters}={total_highlighters}>>{total_highlighters}.
